data.price: "Ya Ubangijĩna! Ka ba ni hukunci, kuma Ka riskar da ni ga sãlihai."
data.arabic: رَبِّ هَبۡ لِي حُكۡمٗا وَأَلۡحِقۡنِي بِٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

meta.transliteration: rabbi hab lī ḥuk'man wa-alḥiq'nī bil-ṣāliḥīna

data.price: "Kuma Ka sanya mini harshen gaskiya* a cikin mutãnen ƙarshe."
data.arabic: وَٱجۡعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدۡقٖ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ
data.footnotes: * Harshen gaskiya shĩ ne yabõ mai kyau. Mutãnen ƙarshe sũ ne Musulmi al'ummar Annabi Muhammadu, mãsu shaida ga annabawa da iyar da manzanci

meta.transliteration: wa-ij'ʿal lī lisāna ṣid'qin fī al-ākhirīna

data.price: "Kuma Ka sanya ni daga magãdan Aljannar ni'ima."

dua.name: Dua for Spiritual Elevation
dua.verseTitle: The Wisdom and Righteous Legacy Supplication
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine wisdom, righteous companionship, and a lasting positive legacy. Popular among those aspiring for spiritual growth and meaningful existence.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
